abilities.name: Psychic Vision
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Mew ex is on your Bench, you may look at your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Devo Crush
attacks.effect: You may discard 2 Energy attached to Mew ex. If you do, you may remove the highest Stage Evolution card from the Defending Pokémon and shuffle that card into your opponent's deck.
